definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
to die of old age/to die in one's bed at a ripe old age
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom)/to skip one's sleep and meals/to be completely wrapped up in one's work
to eat sb's flesh and sleep on their hide (idiom); to swear revenge on sb/implacable hatred/to have sb's guts for garters
see 廢寢忘食|废寝忘食[fei4 qin3 wang4 shi2]
Zai Yu sleeps by day (idiom); refers to story in Analects of Confucius remonstrating bitterly with his student for sleeping during lectures
bed of straw and pillow of clay (idiom)/the correct etiquette for a filial son during the mourning period

sentences.english: He whom the thought of love vexes eats and sleeps very little.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸于爱的人，食不甘味，寝不安眠。

sentences.english: Although Yi Tai Road, sleep, nothing to use it.
sentences.chinese: 虽有义台路寝，无所用之。

sentences.english: One of the men might well have slept with your wife, and you would have brought guilt upon us.
sentences.chinese: 民中险些有人和你的妻同寝，把我们陷在罪里。

definition: to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
imperial concubine or palace maid/imperial secretary (old)
ancient office title/rich and important person
bed of straw and pillow of clay (idiom)/the correct etiquette for a filial son during the mourning period
to hold audience/to advise on state affairs/to administer state affairs/audience hall/to listen in
warm room/warm partition of a room
